    Increases defense if the player is equipped with a sharp weapon.

    useSpecialAbility(Character) - Method in class entity.NormalZombie
    Regenerates HP if current HP is below 50%.

    this method call when player using player's special ability

    Executes the special ability (None for RottenZombie).
    useSpecialAbility(Character) - Method in class entity.RunnerZombie
    Increases dodge chance if the player uses a melee weapon (Heavy or Sharp).
    useSpecialAbility(Character) - Method in class entity.Zombie
    Executes the zombie's special ability on the target.
